SemEval-2014 ABSA Test Data - Gold Annotations

Test Data - Gold

This is the evaluation dataset for Aspect Based Sentiment Analysis (ABSA) Task 4 of SemEval-2014. It consists of two files:

1. The Restaurants_Test_Data_Gold.xml contains 800 English sentences extracted from restaurant reviews. The sentences are annotated with aspect terms, aspect term polarities,… Read More aspect categories and aspect categories polarities.

2. The Laptops_Test_Data_Gold.xml contains 800 English sentences extracted from laptop reviews. The sentences are annotated with aspect terms and aspect terms polarity. Read Less

You don’t have the permission to edit this resource.
